cause.description:
To show people there is a way to get invovled and help those who are struggling with the fight or who have overcome breast cancer, and all by just donating money and walking to help pay for research
1. helping people get the treament they need to survive
2. doing something good that could save someone's life
3. become apart of something great
cause.mission: to alert people to help those who suffer from breast cancer
cause.name: Making Strides Breast Cancer Walk, Boston
